column1: The Purple Pig////I will have to deduct a star on the desserts as they were somewhat lazily prepared. The loukoumades didn't have any particular care put into them as they were kind of plopped on a plate with a lazy pool of honey. The vanilla panna cotta was precisely that; the texture was that of a firm tofu but nothing really made me think "WOW" while eating it. Also
column2: the trio of gelato and sorbet were decent
column3: the roasted white chocolate being the standpoint as it had a depth of layered flavor which we both appreciated.
